sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>(Action) While wielding a Lightsaber weapon, the character may take the Strategic Form action, making a Hard (♦♦♦) Lightsaber (Intellect) check and rolling force dice (white d12) no greater than Force rating as part of the check. For each success, one target within short range of the character may only make combat checks if those combat checks target the character until the end of the following round. The character may spend force points to cause Strategic Form to affect a target for one additional round. The effects of Strategic Form end if the character is incapacitated.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Strategic form</name> <number>TAL0001137</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-23 18:43:58</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e7b53855dbe6cc542901de90cf961912</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-23 18:43:58</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
